channel.title: Epicurus - The experience starts here!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/behindthescenes/images/logo.png[/img]
[size=14pt][url=http://epicurus-rsps.com/]Home Page[/url] | [url=http://epicurus-rsps.com/forum/]Forum[/url] | [url=http://www.epicurus-rsps.com/game/]Play Now[/url][/size]
[b][size=12pt]The full launch is the 21/12/2013.[/size][/b]
[size=14pt]Features[/size] Grand Exchange Flawless party room Lottery Dicing Flawless duel arena, with staking Flawless shopping system Flawless banking system, with searching. Flawless farming system PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc Rank Icon changing system Flawless loyalty title system Flawless donator system New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. Event schedule system Perfect curse system Weapon combination selection in duel arena Special client ::brony mode :) And much, much more.
[img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/newad/bankpins.gif[/img]
[img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/newad/dedispecs.png[/img]
[img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/newad/fixeddicing.gif[/img]
[img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/newad/grandexchange.gif[/img]
[img]http://epicurus-rsps.com/newad/partyroom.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: Epicurus - The experience starts here!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:27, topic:537165”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=655982.msg4391463#msg4391463 date=1387680817]
I’m going to be inactive until after Christmas, the team understand that family comes before any of this. It appears as though they’re having issues with webhosting right now though, bear with us.

Oh, I’d also like to welcome deathschaos9 to the development team :). As I’ve said before though, a lot of us have other commitments during the festive period, don’t expect drastic changes straight away.
[/quote]so is azuroth disbanding?

and good to see more people joining ( is that Deathzi in game? )

I hope you guys can recover my crafting guide :/[/quote]
Not sure what the status will be on Azaruth, I’m sure he’ll clean that up in his next post here. Not sure what his ingame name is, probably either dc9 or deathschaos9 or something like that since John is already taken. We also managed to recover all the forum posts from what I can see

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus - The experience starts here!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

So, while the server-sided guys work on their stuff you’ll all start seeing some improvements with the website. The next week or so the update list should look like:

Vote system finished, current vote system is pretty bad but it functions. Mine should surpass this. 19/12/13
Donation page styled, this is already done pretty well so no complaints there. 19/12/13
Forum theme finished up completely, still a few bugs on the text editor. 19/12/13

---- Break for Christmas, I’m really busy around this time so if I get any work done here it’ll be completely unscripted. ----

Statistics displayed in real-time on the homepage. 26/12/13
Fix the carousel on the homepage, very small bug. 26/12/13
Highscores have been started and will be finished hopefully just after Christmas. ~30/12/13

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus - The experience starts here!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

We’ve had a remodel of the GUI around the client and numerous other game related hotfixes today, along with the vote page styling started! Things are moving forward!

Also, guess who I’m dressed as, it’s turned snowy too… you’d think it was coming up for christmas or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus - The experience starts here!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:3, topic:537165”]It’s back? :eek:
I am really happy to see it running again , i have played it before for a really long time hehe ;D
Let’s hope it doesn’t happen again lol[/quote]
Sure is, relaunched by the original owner with a different development team, come stop by and help us out a bit! Let all the old epicurus guys you know know about it too!

Togasa:

Not really looking forward to this unless a lot is done…otherwise it’ll just look like the rest of the epicurus leeches…ran by the original owners haha

Most of a server is community, not content. The only major difference for this is that the economy is greatly improved on top of the first one. No more items for voting, instead you get an xp boost. No more donating for items that you can sell etc. A much more fair and well done economy. Plus the old community and some server quests and events that’s about all that’s changed.

Read full topic
